sectionText: This class explores a series of critical concepts for the ways that they might illuminate public address and rhetorical theory. Each week will explore a particular concept, including readings on the notion itself, public address that exemplifies it in action, and larger theoretical projects to which it has contributed. I hope in this way to work in the middle ground between text and theory. Students will spend the semester working on a seminar paper and this should be an excellent choice for a methods requirement.
